relatedRecords.description: Byteconf GraphQL is a 100% free single-day conference with the best GraphQL speakers and teachers in the world. relatedRecords.name: Druid Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Druid is an emerging standard in the data infrastructure world, designed for high-performance slice-and-dice analytics (“OLAP”-style) on large data sets.
